Text:
this is the 180 gram, full analog remaster released this year. 

also this is the first time it's been played, i just took it out of the shrink wrap :)

this is fucking great man!!!!.... awesoome sound!!....i can hear how hendrix move his hand arround the neck in little wing!!!! 

im seeding this!!!

PULSE from pink floyd would be COOL!!

thx a lot for this!!!!

glad you like it :D

my pink floyd collection is a little small, but i'll keep an eye out for it, it's on my "list"

Hello! What cartridge you used?? Thanx!
I'm a vinyl fan and I use a GRADO cartridge.
it's Audio Technicha, but i dont know what the model # is, so i dont bother listing it. it is brand new though, not the original cartridge

Forgot to say thank you. You know I've actually got this one on Vinyl just got it never played it haven't got a Turntable
yet. But I am looking.. haven't had a turntable since the 80s but I still have all my LPs..

i just picked up a Kenwood KD-2055, faux marble base, the thing weighs 40+ pounds. i just need to get a new band and we're all set :D check thrift stores, i find alot of rare gems in there. remember the heavier the better lol
awesome album -- my favorite of those you've uploaded.  Do you have any more hendrix LP's?
i've got The Jimi Hendrix Expierence - Smash Hits. just bought it, and it's in great condition  so i'll put it up soon :D
As usual,excellent ! Thank you & Happy New Year
